sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update NeedIt State to Closed Complete and press <return> (enter) on your keyboard.
Get approval from Requested for's Manager and press <return> (enter) on your keyboard.
Set State to Awaiting Approval and assign to Beth Anglin and press <return> (enter)

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Update NeedIt State to Approved and press <return> (enter) on your keyboard.
